description: Destroy a card in your hand. Corrupted: Ascend. Unique. Defiled.

name: Vile Voracity
description:
Deal [damage:6] damage.
When destroyed, upgrade this by two and add two copies to your deck. Defiled.

name: Void Armor
description: Gain {10-[[permaValue]]} Armor. Waning Defiled.

name: Void Lance
description: Deal [damage:3+[[my(status)Anger]]] damage. When this card is destroyed, add a copy to your deck and upgrade it. Rampage.

name: Bottled Message
description: One Use: Conjure a random free card and change the Tide.

name: Fireside Blessings
description: Activate: Draw a card. If it has Firecast, play a copy of it. Otherwise, add Firecast to its keywords this combat. Durability (2/2). Unique.

name: Juggling Balls
description: Activate to discard a card. Perform equal to its cost then draw a card. Deplete: Tada! Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Snake Familiar
description: Activate to inflict 3 Poison. Corrupted: Gain HEALTH for each Affliction on your foe ([[otherAfflictions]]). Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Tinkerer's Toolbox
description: If this has any keywords other than Unique, transfer them to a card in hand. Otherwise, this card gains a random keyword.

name: Agile Mind
description: Choose one: Gain DEX and Evasion or Gain INT and Focus. Gain both if Memorized.

name: Alter Memory
description: Choose a card in your deck. If it has Memorized, destroy it. If it does not, add Memorized. Charges (1/1).

name: Aquarius' Dream
description: After the Tide changes two times, draw 2 cards and Advance. Unique.

name: Aries' Reflection
description: After you Foretell 6 or more cards in a turn, add 3 Prophetic Bolts to your deck and Advance. Unique.

name: Centaur's Truth
description: After you draw 3 additional cards in a turn, gain 10 Barrier and Advance. Unique.

name: Cloak of Sand
description: Gain Swiftness. Gain 2 Momentum. Reset your Ambush.

name: Code of Egality
description: When you play a card, reduce the cost of a card in your hand and deck by 1. Code: All other cards cost the same amount of energy. Unique.

name: Code of Mind
description: Start of Turn: Conjure a free Clarity. Code: All other cards in your deck are Memorized. Unique.

name: Deep Study
description: Draw a card. Repeat until you draw a non-Memorized card.

name: Dervish
description: Make a Basic Attack. Repeat for every stack of Momentum ([[my(status)Momentum]]).

name: Desert Rush
description: Foretell [[foretell+3]], then gain Momentum for each card Foretold. Free while Agile.

name: Desert Veil
description: Gain 1 Swiftness. When played during the first turn of combat, play it as an enchantment. Unique.

name: Diving Strike
description: Deal [damage:6] damage. On Hit: Conjure a free Scorpion Strike at the start of your turn.

name: Enlighten
description: Gain 1 Focus. Reduce the cost of a card in your deck by 1. Repeat for each Focus ([[my(status)Focus]]).

name: Exploration
description: This combat, gain Evasion and reset your Ambush after you Foretell. Unique.

name: Houroboros
description: Activate to Foretell [[foretell+3]]. Reactivates when the Tide changes. Deplete: Take an extra turn. Durability (5/5). Unique.

name: Inevitable End
description: This combat, inflict [[damageBonus+1]] Doom at the start of your turn, then increase this by 1. Upgradable. Unique.

name: Leo's Pride
description: After you gain 3 or more Focus in one turn, gain Evasion and Advance. Unique.

name: Moonwell
description: This combat, remove all counters on Moonwell and gain that much HEALTH at the start of your turn. Add a counter for each card you Foretell. Unique.

name: Passing of Time
description: Foretell [[foretell+3]]. Conjure a free copy of any Memorized card revealed this way.

name: Quicksand
description: Gain {[[(cardvalue)]]+1} Momentum and inflict {[[(cardvalue)]]+1} Doom for each Quicksand you've played. Conjure a free copy when you gain Evasion.

name: Return to Dust
description: Draw 3 cards. Reset your Ambush. Agile: Costs no energy.

name: Rusty Lamp
description: Activate to delve a Revelation. Permanently destroyed after {3-[[permaValue]]} uses. Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Sand Nova
description: Make a Basic Attack. Repeat for each other type of Nova card you played this combat ([[novacards]]).

name: Sand Soldiers
description: Create a Clone. Create a free copy when you gain Evasion. Persistent.

name: Sandblast
description: Deal [damage:3] damage. Agile: Gain 3 Momentum and Interrupt.

name: Sandshroud
description: Gain 1 Evasion. If you have 3 or more Momentum, gain Swiftness.

name: Sandstride
description: This combat, whenever you Evade an action, conjure a Surge of Dexterity at the start of your turn. Unique.

name: Scorpio's Ruin
description: After you inflict 6 or more Doom in one turn, inflict 1 Jinxed and Advance. Unique.

name: Scorpion Strike
description: Deal [damage:6] damage. Inflict Doom for each damage dealt. Agile: Inflict Stunned. Persistent.

name: Sifting Time
description: This turn, gain Barrier for each card you Foretell. Persistent.

name: Taurus' Rage
description: After you make 3 or more Basic Attacks in a turn, gain INTDEX and Advance. Unique.

name: The Journey
description: Choose a rare Path and play it. Scholar: Draw a card for each active Path ([[paths]]). Unique.

name: Divine Power
description: Gain Oathbound. Gain Anger, Rally and HOLY for each of your Scars ([[scars]]). Charges (1/1).

name: Forge of Wrath
description: Activate to take 3 damage, gain HOLY and create a Battlespear. Durability (5/5). Unique.

name: Forged in Fire
description: Create a Battlespear. Upgrade all Untempered cards for each HEALTH you gained this turn ([[healingTurn]]).

name: Holy Mackerel
description: One use: Gain 3 Rally. Garnish: Remove a Scar and heal to full HEALTH.

name: Holy Nova
description: Gain 1 HEALTH. Repeat for each other type of Nova card you played this combat ([[novacards]]). Firecast.

name: Chaos Nova
description: Inflict a random Affliction. Repeat for each other type of Nova card you played this combat ([[novacards]]).

name: Grimoire of Fire
description: Activate to delve a Fire Action and play it. Deplete: Gain Aura of Flames. Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Grimoire of Hate
description: Activate to delve a Corrupted Action and play it. Deplete: Gain Lifelink. Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Grimoire of Ice
description: Activate to delve a Frost Action and play it. Deplete: Gain Aura of Rime. Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Grimoire of Storms
description: Activate to delve a Lightning Action and play it. Deplete: Gain Amp Up. Durability (3/3). Unique.

name: Bone Nova
description: Deal [damage:1] damage. Repeat for each other type of Nova card you played this combat ([[novacards]]). Reaping.

name: Carrion Cut
description: This combat, the first card of the round you return to your hand costs no energy. Unique. Memorized.

name: Corrosive Spirits
description: Inflict 4 Poison. Ancestral: Repeat this for every 10 of your Souls.

name: Creeping Death
description: This combat, gain 1 Potency whenever you finish a Performance. Unique.

name: Dance of Blight
description: Gain Ritualist and [[damageBonus+1]] Potency. Completing a Performance returns this to hand. Upgradeable. Heavy.

name: Dance of Life
description: Gain Ritualist. Restore 5% of your Maximum HEALTH ([[myMaxHealth/20]]). Completing a Performance returns this to hand. Heavy.

name: Dance of Spirits
description: Gain Ritualist and 3 Souls. When you finish a Performance, return this to hand. Charges (3/3). Heavy.

name: Dark End
description: Slay a foe with less Maximum HEALTH than your Souls ([[souls]]). Execute: Start next combat with an Effigy.

name: Enfeeble
description: Inflict 1 Weakness. Your foe loses 10% of their Maximum HEALTH ([[otherMaxHealth/10]]).

name: Extraction
description: Requires an Effigy Gain 5% of your current Maximum HEALTH as Souls ([[myMaxHealth/20]]). Unique.

name: Gravedance
description: Perform 1. Repeat for every card returned to your hand this turn ([[cardsReturnedThisTurn]]). Persistent.

name: Mojo
description: Perform 1. Use up to 3 Souls to Perform an additional time per Soul spent.

name: Pinspitter
description: Deal [damage:5] damage. On Hit: Delve a Pin if you control an Effigy.

name: Soulbinder
description: Steal 1 Maximum HEALTH for every 2 Souls you have, then gain that amount of HEALTH ([[souls/2]]). Heavy.

name: Soulfood
description: Create an Ingredient. Whenever you complete a Performance, return this to hand. Heavy.

name: Spirit Duet
description: Perform 1. Ancestral: Gains Souls equal to your Performance ([[perfomanceStacks]]). Charges (3/3).

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Requires an Effigy Heal 20 percent of your Maximum HEALTH ([[myMaxHealth/5]]). Your foe loses an equal amount of Maximum HEALTH. Unique.

name: Spiritbomb
description: Deal [damage:6] damage. On Hit: Gain temporary Maximum HEALTH equal to the damage this dealt. Reaping.

name: Toxic Bloom
description: Slay a foe with less Maximum HEALTH than Poison. Execute: Permanently gain [[damageBonus+1]] Maximum HEALTH. Upgradable.

name: Toxic Relation
description: This combat, gain temporary Maximum HEALTH equal to the amount of Poison you inflict. Unique.

name: Vodou
description: Requires an Effigy Slay a foe with HEALTH less than 10% of your Maximum HEALTH ([[myMaxHealth/10]]). Imbue their Enchantment. Remove this if no effect is available. Unique.

name: Vodou Mask
description: Activate to have your next Performance start a Ritual, then Perform 1. Durability (5/5). Unique. Memorized.

name: Vulture Soul
description: This combat, when you inflict Poison, gain that much Ferocity. Unique.
